skills.title: Family
skills.description: I come from a lineage of exceptional cooks. Acquiring their skills and keeping their unique culinary flair alive is of great significance to me.

skills.title: Sharing Knowledge
skills.description: I aspire to spread knowledge and joy by sharing my cherished family recipes with the world, as it's a heartfelt way to preserve and celebrate my family's culinary heritage.

skills.title: Passion for food and cooking!
skills.description: I share my recipes with the world out of my deep love for food and cooking, cherishing the joy and connection they bring.

skills.title: Health is Wealth
skills.description: Health is the ultimate wealth, a priceless treasure that enriches every aspect of life.
